item.title: Haproxy on Macosx
item.description: Install Homebrew Open your terminal and then run command bellow to install homebrew $ /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Visit Homebrew official site for more details Install haproxy using Homebrew brew install haproxy Add Configuration Update haproxy configution file located in /usr/local/etc/haproxy.cfg. Create if dosen’t exists already. Here is an initial configuration for you to start with global log 127.0.0.1 local0 log 127.0.0.1 local1 debug maxconn 4096 user rimonmostafiz group admin daemon pidfile /var/run/haproxy.
